articles.title: Ashes 2023, 1st Test Day 1 Live Score and Updates: Joe Root key as England lose wickets in a hurry - India Today
articles.description: Ashes 2023, England vs Australia, Day 1 Live Score and Updates: Nathan Lyon has got the big wicket of Jonny Bairstow in the final session. The wicketkeeper falls for a run-a-ball 78 after a 100-plus stand with Joe Root. England are closing in on 300, having s…
articles.content: Hello and welcome to India Today's live updates for the Ashes 1st Test (Day 1).

articles.author: Stephen Luntz
articles.title: Meet The Giant Armored Fossil Skink Twice As Big As Largest Surviving Species - IFLScience
articles.description: Fifty thousand years ago in Australia, even the skinks were chonky.
articles.content: A newly described species of skink was 1,000 times heavier than the typical member of that family. The largest known skink went extinct 47,000 years ago, at the same time as many other Australian gia… [+3542 chars]
